   16: -module(adhoc_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Suite configuration
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: all() ->
   26:     [{group, adhoc}].
   27: 
   28: groups() ->
   29:     [{adhoc, [sequence], [ping]}].
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   33: 
   34: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   35:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   36: 
   37: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   39: 
   40: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   41:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   42: 
   43: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   44:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   45: 
   46: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   47:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   48: 
   49: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   50:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   51: 
   52: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   53: %% Adhoc tests
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: ping(Config) ->
   56:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   57:                   fun(Alice) ->
   58:                           %% Alice pings the server using adhoc command
   59:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:to(escalus_stanza:adhoc_request(<<"ping">>),
   60:                                                                        ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain))),
   61: 
   62:                           %% Server replies to Alice with pong
   63:                           AdHocResp = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   64:                           escalus:assert(is_adhoc_response, [<<"ping">>, <<"completed">>],
   65:                                          AdHocResp)
   66:                   end).
